```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(lubridate)

mon <- as_date("2023-05-22")
tues <- mon+days(1)
wed <- mon+days(2)
thur <- mon+days(3)
fri <- mon+days(4)
sat <- mon+days(5)

advdate <- function(day, week) {
  date <- (day + weeks(week))
  dm <- paste(month(date, label = TRUE)," ",day(date))
  return(dm)  
} 
```
